eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the RecoveryManager role is transferred.

functionDecorators.name: addBank
functionDecorators.description: Adds a bank that this can get fees from.

functionDecorators.name: addLPToken
functionDecorators.description: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering.

parameterDecorators.name: lp
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the LP token.

functionDecorators.name: addSwapLP
functionDecorators.description: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering.

parameterDecorators.name: lp
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the LP token.

functionDecorators.name: addToken
functionDecorators.description: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering.

functionDecorators.name: addYakStrat
functionDecorators.description: Adds a yield yak token, to allow withdrawing.

functionDecorators.name: allocate
functionDecorators.description: For allocating the revenue to the correct locations.

functionDecorators.name: changeDev
functionDecorators.description: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering.

parameterDecorators.name: _dev
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the LP token.

functionDecorators.name: changeSeafund
functionDecorators.description: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering.

parameterDecorators.name: _seafund
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the LP token.

functionDecorators.name: changeTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Adds a LP token, to allow transfering.

parameterDecorators.name: _treasury
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the LP token.

functionDecorators.name: getBankCount
functionDecorators.description: Gets the numbers of banks this account controls.

functionDecorators.name: getLPTokens
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of LP tokens this account controls.

functionDecorators.name: getTokens
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of tokens this account controls.

functionDecorators.name: getYakCount
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of yield yak banks (tokens) this account controls.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes the Adder. We are doing proxy here as we might add seperate fees that need to be converted later. Easier than changing treasuries over.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferBankVault
functionDecorators.description: for transfering treasury bank vault. Only use if changing contracts.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
